languages.text: "Не плачь, дитя. Я оборву твою нить быстро и безболезненно до того, как душа твоя поддастся скверне".
"Do not weep, child. I will cut your thread quickly and painlessly before your soul succumbs to corruption."
languages.original_text: "Не плачь, дитя. Я оборву твою нить быстро и безболезненно до того, как душа твоя поддастся скверне".

traits.locale_text: "Do not weep, child. I will cut your thread quickly and painlessly before your soul succumbs to corruption."
"Do not weep, child. I will cut your thread quickly and painlessly before your soul succumbs to corruption."
"Do not weep, child. I will cut your thread quickly and painlessly before your soul succumbs to corruption."
"Do not weep, child. I will cut your thread quickly and painlessly before your soul succumbs to corruption."
"Do not weep, child. I will cut your thread quickly and painlessly before your soul succumbs to corruption."

languages.text: “别哭了，小姑娘。我会赶在你的灵魂彻底腐化之前，迅速切断你的丝线，不会有任何痛苦。”
languages.original_text: "Do not weep, child. I will cut your thread quickly and painlessly before your soul succumbs to corruption."

traits.locale_text: “别哭了，小姑娘。我会赶在你的灵魂彻底腐化之前，迅速切断你的丝线，不会有任何痛苦。”

languages.text: «No temas, niña. Cortaré tu hilo de forma rápida e indolora antes de que tu alma sucumba a la corrupción».
languages.original_text: "Do not weep, child. I will cut your thread quickly and painlessly before your soul succumbs to corruption."

traits.locale_text: «No temas, niña. Cortaré tu hilo de forma rápida e indolora antes de que tu alma sucumba a la corrupción».

languages.text: "Ağlama çocuğum. Ruhun yozlaşmaya yenik düşmeden önce ipliğini çabucak, acısızca keseceğim."
languages.original_text: "Do not weep, child. I will cut your thread quickly and painlessly before your soul succumbs to corruption."

traits.locale_text: "Ağlama çocuğum. Ruhun yozlaşmaya yenik düşmeden önce ipliğini çabucak, acısızca keseceğim."

languages.text: 「わめくな、子ども。あなたの魂が腐敗に屈する前にすぐに、痛みなく切ってやる」
languages.original_text: "Do not weep, child. I will cut your thread quickly and painlessly before your soul succumbs to corruption."

traits.locale_text: 「わめくな、子ども。あなたの魂が腐敗に屈する前にすぐに、痛みなく切ってやる」

languages.text: « Ne pleurez pas, mon enfant. Je couperai votre fil rapidement et sans douleur, avant que votre âme ne succombe à la corruption. »
languages.original_text: "Do not weep, child. I will cut your thread quickly and painlessly before your soul succumbs to corruption."

traits.locale_text: « Ne pleurez pas, mon enfant. Je couperai votre fil rapidement et sans douleur, avant que votre âme ne succombe à la corruption. »

languages.text: "Weint nicht, Kind. Ich werde Euren Faden schnell und schmerzlos durchtrennen, ehe Eure Seele von der Verderbnis überwältigt wird."
languages.original_text: "Do not weep, child. I will cut your thread quickly and painlessly before your soul succumbs to corruption."

traits.locale_text: "Weint nicht, Kind. Ich werde Euren Faden schnell und schmerzlos durchtrennen, ehe Eure Seele von der Verderbnis überwältigt wird."
